page.title: 16ANGLING
page.content: A great number of tourists are attracted to this area because of the fishing in Loch Awe and surrounding lochs. Salmon,sea trout,brown trout rainbow trout, char, pike and perch are all species found in the loch. The rainbow trout is the only specimen introduced to the loch not by controlled stocking but by fish escaping from several fish farms situated on the loch. Some anglers feel that the introduction of the "rainbows" has had a detrimental effect on the brown trout fishing. Fishing has always been free on Loch Awe but in the past months local landowners have been considering some types of control on fishing due to damage caused by a small minority of inconsiderate anglers. This issue will undoubtedly be a controversial topic for discussion in angling circles.
